article.title: Unisys to Provide Continued Support to Defense Department Freight Management System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. General Services Administration has awarded Unisys a task order to design, develop and maintain the Military Surface Deployment and Distribution Command's Global Freight Management system, which is used by the U.S. Defense Department to purchase commercial freight transportation services. Unisys also will provide project management and integration services, e-commerce solutions, systems training, and software testing and documentation.
